question: Who of the following confessed, “We have no right to seize Sind, yet we shall do so and a very advantageous, useful, humane piece of rascality it will be."
explanation: The annexation of Sindh took place in the year 1843. Charles Napier led the battle of Miani and ended up with the annexation. Later he confessed, “We have no right to seize Sind, yet we shall do so and a very advantageous, useful, humane piece of rascality it will be\".
